message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth significantly more to me.  How about we settle at $18,000?
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value you place on the product, I am willing to go up to $16,000. This is my final offer.
